catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Collection of kabbalistic texts
author: Segal, Yaʿaḳov ben Ḳalonymos
description: Contents: Yaʿaḳov ben Ḳalonymos Segal, Naḥalat Yaʿaḳov (ff. 1r-75v). Yaʿaḳov ben Ḳalonymos Segal, Magen le-holkhe tom ṿe-yosher (ff. 76r-91r). Moses ben Jacob Cordovero, ʾOr yaḳar (ff. 92r-269r). Moses ben Jacob Cordovero, Shemonah be-inyan ha-gilgul (ff. 270r-273v). Israel ben Moses Najara, Kanfe Yonah (ḥeleḳ 1, 1-40) (ff. 283r-311r).
